0.2.0.description: Display the nearest TODO line on top right of the editor

0.1.0.name: back-text
0.1.0.description: A short description of your package

readme:
# back-text package The package display a large background text of choice (possibly TODO).
For TODO text, it will read the TODO tags in the file, then display the nearest top TODO from the cursor.
The style was inspired by atom-power-mode
![A screenshot of your package](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/69169/2290250/c35d867a-a017-11e3-86be-cd7c5bf3ff9b.gif)
